content: it s a simple little pattern but i couldn t find anything to exactly suite my needs out there so i wrote it up myself this little cozy is the perfect size to store and protect a set of earbuds the velcro keeps them secure inside and the strap will let you hook it onto your player or elsewhere a co-worker has also discovered that this little pouchy is very perfect for storing our secure id token cards for work in i have also created one of these for myself for holding my usb flash drive / jump drive / thumb drive whatever you like to call yours i find that a colorful little pouch is a lot less likely to get lost in my bag than a tiny black little device
